info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ROCKINGHAM...NORTHWESTERN CASWELL AND SOUTHWESTERN PITTSYLVANIA COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF DANVILLE THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Draper, or over Eden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Eden... Bethel... Providence... Mayfield... Gatewood... and Ruffin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and south central, southwestern and west central Virginia.
